subject: RE: OR - Eugene PD, F053 Relocation
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Good Morning,

 

Katie here with the Flock Safety Relocations Team! I'm happy to help with relocating these cameras to prevent further vandalism. Thank you for providing the new coordinates. I created a relocation case and passed this along to the Deployment Specialist so they can create a deployment plan for the new location. Once the plan is ready, I will send you a link to go over the location via the Deployment Tracker to ensure everything looks correct before we move forward

 

Please let me know if you have any questions in the meantime!

 

Stay safe,

Katie

 
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Matt Triana [matt.triana@flocksafety.com]
Sent: 6/5/2025, 2:24 PM
To: gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com; support@flocksafety.com; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov
Subject: OR - Eugene PD, F053 Relocation


Hi Support Team,
 
Due to some recent vandalism of other Flock poles in this area, we are wanting to relocate this Flock pole to an existing traffic light. You may view the current F053 location on the Eugene PD Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c58276056f7f841b1e62576ad7ebe9d195c941630a89d13cb02bc37914c3dde5d508db881988d2605f5016b34944b71976ac .
 
Plan is to shift to the traffic signal at these coordinates https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B001'27.4%22N+123%C2%B004'30.7%22W/@44.0243283,-123.0752058,200m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.0242647!4d-123.0752058?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYwMy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D . We installed this camera less than 30 days ago so I believe we can relocate this one at no cost to the PD and Detective Dewitt, who is on this email.
 
Please start the relocation process and let me know when the opp is ready. Please also let me know what I can do to help.
 
Thank you!
 
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/N8dQjWVQ3Zda.png> 

 

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com .
 <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000mM9Nc&from=ext> 

thread::TVFALqB7K-egA_MrFfAxBw4::
